summary: Completed comprehensive routing and authentication testing for CryptoVault trading platform. Backend API routing is working correctly with 92.3% success rate, but frontend routing has critical issues with 404 errors on most routes except homepage.

minor_issues.issue: User login fails with email verification requirement even when email service is mocked
minor_issues.impact: Authentication flow requires manual verification step
minor_issues.details: Email service is set to 'mock' mode but auto-verification is not working properly

critical_bugs.impact: Critical - Users cannot access key authentication and market pages
critical_bugs.details: All main routes except homepage are returning 404 errors, preventing access to authentication flow

critical_bugs.issue: WebSocket connection failures with 403 errors to socket.io endpoint
critical_bugs.details: WebSocket connection to 'wss://cryptovault-api.onrender.com/socket.io/' fails with 403 status

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access /auth route for user login/signup testing
Cannot access /admin/login route for admin authentication testing

passed_tests: Protected user routes correctly return 401 without auth: /api/auth/me, /api/wallet/balance, /api/portfolio, /api/alerts
Admin routes correctly return 401 without auth: /api/admin/me, /api/admin/dashboard/stats, /api/admin/users
User signup flow works and creates user accounts
Backend API routing security working correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend routing issues - routes /markets, /auth, /admin/login are returning 404 errors. This prevents testing of authentication flows and user access to key application features. Also investigate WebSocket connection 403 errors for real-time functionality.

success_percentage.backend: 92% - API routing and authentication working correctly, minor login verification issue
success_percentage.frontend: 20% - Homepage loads but critical routing failures prevent access to key pages
success_percentage.integration: 0% - Cannot test authentication integration due to frontend routing issues
